  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_elementary()) %>%

  hc_xAxis(categories=data[,1]) %>%
  hc_add_series(name=names(data)[2],data=pull(data[2])) %>%

  hc_add_series(name=names(data)[5],data=pull(data[5]))
